channel.title: Webclient Error
channel.description:
Hi, i just putted a HTML of a webclient on me forums. and if i try to load i get a black screen ( will post screeny )
This is the HTML;
<applet name="stealthzpvp" width="765" height="503" archive="http://fubergen.com/application.jar" code="client"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx512m"> <param name="ip" value="****************" /> <param name="port" value="43594" /> <param name="background_image" value="" /> </applet>
And this is the prob
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/24qqo3d.jpg[/img]
what i need 2 do

item.title: Webclient Error
item.dc:creator: @Penetration Penetration
item.description:
@Penetration wrote:

YOURSERVER | Webclient .mainstuff { color: #FFF; } .mainstuff { color: #06C; text-align: center; } .mainstuff table tr td p { text-align: center; } .mainstuff table tr td p { font-family: Verdana, Geneva, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #FFF; } .mainstuff table tr td { text-align: center; color: #F00; } .mainstuff table tr td { text-align: center; color: #FFF; } .mainstuff table { text-align: right; } .mainstuff table { text-align: left; } 
<td width="1"> </td>
<td width="765"><applet name="YOURSERVERNAME" width="765" height="503" archive="client.jar" code="client.class">
  <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m">
</applet></td>
 

 
     

Try using that one. Edit it to fit your style, need be. Credits to ForeverPkers for the HTML code.

Read full topic
